text.value: Client's first or given name
Client's family name or last name
The date and time of the client's visit
The type of facility or service reporting using an HIV case report form
Client is currently taking antiretroviral therapy
Number of days from diagnosis to initiation on antiretroviral therapy (ART)
Date when the client was first diagnosed to be at a clinical stage 1
Date when the client was first diagnosed to be at a clinical stage 2
Date when the client was first diagnosed to be at a clinical stage 3
Date when the client was first diagnosed to be at a clinical stage 4
Whether the client has active TB
Whether self-tests distribution is community-based, facility-based, secondary distribution (for example, by index case, key population member, or antenatal care client)
Type of site where self-test kit was distributed (for example, community outreach, workplace, or family planning clinic)
Date case report form was completed
Case reporting form was submitted
Date case report form was submitted electronically
Probable route(s) of transmission of HIV to client
Client's partner is a member of a key population, which has an increased risk of HIV
Linkage made from HIV testing to enrolment in care following an HIV diagnosis
Type of case report that is received (new or update)
The date on which the submitted case reporting form was received
Date client was changed from a first-line to second-line ARV drug regimen (switch)
Date on which ARV drug regimen for client was changed within the second-line regimen (substitution)
Date and time when the sample was collected to test the client's HIV viral load
Dates and results of all PCR tests, including the one that confirmed infection
Infant had known exposure to HIV
Whether a voluntary medical male circumcision procedure was performed
Date on which a voluntary medical male circumcision procedure was performed
Whether an adverse event was reported associated with a voluntary medical male circumcision procedure
Complications resulted in death or hospitalization within 30 days of the procedure or permanent disability
Severity of the adverse event
When the adverse event occurred
